jumbotron_text: Join us on Discord because we are cool!
one_step_away: You're one step away from joining {{GUILD}}!
only_robot_can_enter: Thomas Bot is the only robot who may enter
confirm_not_robot: Can you confirm you're not a fellow robot?
programme_not_here_desc: Your programme is not here yet? Do you want to know when they launch a Discord community? Sign up below and we will let you know when there is news!
let_me_know_when_discord_launches: Let me know when our Discord launches!
fill_in_your_details: Fill in your details, don't worry I will not spam you (I am a friendly robot)!
